verses.name: Job 33:24
verses.text: Then he is gracious unto him, and saith, Deliver him from going down to the pit: I have found a ransom.

verses.name: Job 33:25
verses.text: His flesh shall be fresher than a child’s: he shall return to the days of his youth:

verses.name: Job 33:26
verses.text: He shall pray unto God, and he will be favourable unto him: and he shall see his face with joy: for he will render unto man his righteousness.

verses.name: Job 33:27
verses.text: He looketh upon men, and if any say, I have sinned, and perverted that which was right, and it profited me not;
